job_tasks.phrase: We bouwen producten, tools en modellen op basis van predictive modeling, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, LLM's en nog meer!
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions building models using various AI techniques like predictive modeling, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk bijvoorbeeld aan een prepayment forecasting model, Document Data extraction, Chatbots, LLM's, en Summary tools.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase provides specific examples of models and applications being built, all falling under the umbrella of modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij maakt deel uit van het Datalab, een relatief jonge afdeling binnen New Business & Innovation
job_tasks.justification: Being part of 'New Business & Innovation' implies an understanding of business growth and strategic initiatives.

job_tasks.phrase: helpen zij onze klanten en Stater vooruit.
job_tasks.justification: The goal of helping clients and Stater move forward indicates a focus on business outcomes and value creation.

job_tasks.phrase: gaan we bouwen aan een product.
job_tasks.justification: Building a product implies understanding market needs and business strategy to deliver a valuable offering.

job_tasks.phrase: We zijn in contact met (grote) klanten en gaan vaak samen met de klant verder het proces in; co-creatie.
job_tasks.justification: Direct interaction with clients for co-creation highlights the need to understand client business needs and collaborate on solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Ook werken we nauw samen met andere afdelingen binnen Stater, de business consultants en relatiemanagers, IT, Tech, architecten, developers maar ook legal, risk, compliancy en BI-beheer teams.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with various business and technical departments indicates a need to understand and align with different business functions.

job_tasks.phrase: gaan we bouwen aan een product.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bouwen aan een product' implies software development activities to bring a model or tool to life.

job_tasks.phrase: naar het live zetten en implementeren van het product.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'live zetten en implementeren van het product' directly refers to the deployment and integration aspects of software development.
Building chatbots, LLMs, and summary tools are applications that require software development to be functional and deployable.

job_tasks.phrase: naar het live zetten en implementeren van het product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to operational aspects of getting a product (likely incorporating ML/GenAI models) into a live production environment.

soft_skills.phrase: als we uit de data-analyse en inzichten zien dat we iets moois in handen hebben
samen met de klant verder het proces in; co-creatie

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes building products and tools using LLMs, Chatbots, and other generative techniques. It highlights co-creation with clients and the implementation of these models into production, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
